thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 44 of 522
thread.title: Ariel Harris

author: Ariel Harris
title: Ariel Harris
text: I ordered two different pairs of work out pants and they are the worst pants I have ever worn. They keep falling down! They fit nicely if you are just standing around, but try to move in them and they just ride down! SO ANNOYING I had to stop 50 times on my run to hike them up higher and higher! and Free 7-10 day shipping? Why when you can get free 2 day shipping?
